data: {"generalSituation":"A broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the northern part of the South China Sea tomorrow. A fresh to strong easterly airstream will reach the coast of Guangdong later tomorrow. It will be windy over the region in the following couple of days. The northeast monsoon is expected to affect the coastal areas of southern China gradually towards the weekend. The weather will be slightly cool in the morning during the weekend to early next week. Besides, the broad area of low pressure near the central part of the Philippines will move across the southern part of the South China Sea today and tomorrow, and towards Vietnam.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251028","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4. East force 5 later, occasionally force 6 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning and at night.
